page.title: 13Hair Fashions
page.content: We went to Diane Hair International but it was full up and they could not answer any questions. We then went to Cut Above but they said to call back later as they were too busy also. Then we went to the tattooist but that was shut.We then went to 'Personalities' and we asked some questions. We asked what the most popular haircut was and how much does it cost. The answer was a layered haircut and it costs Â£2.00. We then asked what haircut costs the most. The answer was the longer the hair the more it costs.It could vary to about Â£4.00. We then asked which is the cheapest haircut. The answer was Â£1.00 for a baby's haircut. We asked how many years you have to train as a barber. The answer was 5 years for a professional and 3 years for an apprentice.
